actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Security and Scientific Affairs.
Executive Comment Requested from State, EPA, National Science Foundation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Security and Scientific Affairs

official_title: A joint resolution recognizing the year of international scientific inquiry which is being conducted into the environmental consequences of nuclear war and urging wide dissemination of the conclusions reached during this international year of research.

summary.text: Declares that the United States recognizes an international year of research into the ecological consequences of nuclear war. Asks the President to encourage other countries, especially the Soviet Union and other nuclear-weapon states, to recognize such international year of research. Urges that the conclusions of such international research be disseminated, particularly to Congress, the President, other executive branch officials, and the Soviet Union.

titles.title: A joint resolution recognizing the year of international scientific inquiry which is being conducted into the environmental consequences of nuclear war and urging wide dissemination of the conclusions reached during this international year of research.
